Erispe, R. (2023, March 10). Regil Erispe on Instagram: “Knickerbocker 😋😋😋😋 Zamboanga City, Philippines #zamboangacity #knickerbocker #food #Mindanao #dessert #foodie #fruits #lifeofadventure #philippines #itsmorefuninthephilippines #choosephilippines #delicious #asian #awesomeearth #bestplacetogo #beautifuldestinations #picoftheday #adventure #photography #backpacker #Like4like #follow #instagram #photooftheday #travel #traveler #liveauthentic #travelstroke #vacation.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/BdKVx_Enxd6/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA 

Ringel, G. (2023, May 12). Gelo Ringel on Instagram: “A must try in Zamboanga .... ‘Knicker Bocker’ - healthy NA refreshing pa. #gelolakwatsero2017 #wheninzamboanga #knickerbocker #bonggazamboanga #travellocal #experiencephilippines #pinoytravel.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/BYSzcEBjZZ_/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA

See, D. (2023, March 14). Day see on Instagram: “your zamboanga trip will never be complete without trying their famous beef satti, an authentic dish in Zamboanga that has a diverse history and influence from its surrounding islands with Muslim traditions. it’s spicy and a little bit sweet. but it’s actually more on the spicy side, too spicy that it can sometimes make you cough a bit. you know that feeling when you tasted a dish that has too much pepper on it that it makes your throat itchy. 😂 Pero Lami Siya, labi na ang beef stew.. this one cost 70 pesos. 4beef stew with 2 puso na siya. 🙂 must try when you visit Zambo. 🙂 #satti #muslimfood #travel #travelph #musttry #samboanga #explore #food #foodstagram #foodblogger #beefstew.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/CpxIM0aJ76n/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA 

Mae | Cooking | Eating | Loving Life! (2023, May 17). Mae: Cooking: Eating: Loving life! on Instagram: “☀️🍢🍧🍹 summer vibes in London town! satti de Zamboanga BBQ and this dip hits every BBQ spot! now pass the rice please 😋 __ originated from Zamboanga, Philippines. eaten for breakfast with ‘Puso’ boiled rice wrapped in palm leaves....I know what you’re thinking but Filipinos eat rice all day long 😂😂. this dish is usually beef or chicken, marinate overnight then BBQ to perfection. the dip is usually serves over bbq sticks and rice and lots of it. __ #ilovefilopinofood #filifooduk #filipinorecipes #whattocook #filipinocuisine #foodstories #letscook #londonfoodies #eaterlondon #filipinofoodmovement #pinoyfood #londoneats #foodiesofig #filipinofood #timeoutlondon #foodblogger #foodphotography #food #foodstyling #sattidezamboanga #satti #bbq #summer #summervibes☀️.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/B0TCLIhHc3C/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA 

https://www.instagram.com/p/CI10zinH_nH/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA 

Dy, P. (2023, April 22). Phil Dy on Instagram: “chicken satti de zamboanga. grilled skewered chicken and rice cakes in a sweet and spicy soup heavy on ginger, turmeric, and chili. makes you feel all warm inside.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/BnQWs_eD2m-/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA

Pinas, E. (2023, May 17). Enjoy Pinas on Instagram: “You can’t go wrong with the crunchy Tausug snack Lokot-Lokot. also known as Zamboanga Rolls, zambo rolls or JAA by the locals, it’s a crunchy, golden brown delicacy made from pounded rice and sugar.⠀ ⠀ #EnjoyPinas #lokotlokot #snack #zamboangarolls #zamborolls #jaa #crunchy #goldenbrown #delicacy #tausugsnack #snack.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/B0u59oUnNoU/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA

Kader, Z. (2023, May 17). Zainab Kader on Instagram: “Kuracha is a real treat. my first taste was in Zamboanga, the Philipines. best when u just steam them or cooked with sweet sour sauce.... @rubydiamond28 , @baijam_ . I miss these so much. so, I use crabs, Udang Galah at HaciendaHermosa. that will do till I get my kuracha.” Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/BydyFJ7J0Aw/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA
